GSD.description:
PM: core: keep irq flags in device_pm_check_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 78c4d68b952f5f537788dbd454031ea9bf50f642. For more details please see the references link.
